env.info: (at 0 1) (sort 1 microwave) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (type 1 container) (closed 1) (sort 2 desk) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 chair) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (sort 4 desk) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 cup) (size 5 small) (color 5 black) (at 5 4) (sort 6 cup) (size 6 small) (color 5 yellow) (sort 7 book) (size 7 small) (color 7 blue) (inside 7 1) (sort 8 can) (size 8 small) (color 8 black) (sort 9 bottle) (size 9 small) (color 9 blue) (plate 9) (sort 10 bottle) (size 10 small) (color 10 yellow) (at 10 3) (sort 11 cup) (size 11 small) (color 11 white) (at 11 4) (sort 12 remotecontrol) (size 12 small) (sort 13 can) (size 13 small) (hold 13) (sort 14 book) (size 14 small) (color 14 yellow)

test.instr: (:ins (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (color X white) (sort X cup))) (:task (open X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X microwave))) (:cons_not (:info (on X Y) (:cond (color X white) (sort X cup) (sort Y chair)))) )
test.nl: Pick up the remotecontrol. Pick up the white cup. Open the microwave. The white cup must not be on chair.
